Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run only: the metro parks website states Bucks is groomed for skate and classic. While technically true, it was groomed yesterday, not today. So with the slushing up in the warm sunshine yesterday and the overnight freeze, the classic tracks are icy and debris filled. Skate deck is hard and fast. Would be nice if the groomers would use those 2 big piles of snow, but rumor has it they are short staffed this week.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were packed yesterday morning. There is a classic track set on all trails. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The snow surface is expertly machine groomed this morning. The snow quality continues to be very good thanks to the fresh snow that fell a few days ago. The temperature will go above freezing today so softer snow is expected as the day goes on. The forecast is calling for a wintery mix of precipitation during the day. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and the espresso bar. The soup of the day is tomato. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
